thread.section_title: HomeAdvisor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HomeAdvisor | www.homeadvisor.com
thread.title: Elaine Lake

author: Elaine Lake
title: Elaine Lake
text: While it took a month for them to come by and look at my job and give me a price Quote: , when he did come out the price Quote: was a great price and he was able to do the job right then and there. The quality of his work is awesome and his pricing excellent. They are quite busy this time of year so if you can wait 3-4 weeks for them to come look at your job and give you an estimate, this is the company for you! Professional in appearance and great on their job pricing and the quality of their work is top notch. Makes sure to do the little extra things that you as a homeowner don't think about and tells you exactly what they did when they are through with the job.
